Ben-Franklin's-Autoencoder.title: Ben Franklin's Autoencoder
Ben-Franklin's-Autoencoder.content:
Ben Franklin’s Autoencoder
Ben Franklin’s method of reading a piece of writing, taking notes on it, and then trying to reproduce the original piece from his notes is identical to an autoencoder architecture in deep learning.
